tasks.label: ninja build
tasks.command: rm -rf vbuild; mkdir vbuild; cd vbuild; cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX="${workspaceRoot}/vbuild/gmt6" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug ${ADD_FLAGS} -G "Ninja" ..; ninja; ninja install; mkdir debug; cp ${workspaceRoot}/.vscode/project.env debug/project.env

tasks.label: ninja rebuild
tasks.command: cd vbuild; ninja; ninja install; mkdir debug; cp ${workspaceRoot}/.vscode/project.env debug/project.env
